RINL made the first dispatch of 51 Loco wheels to Lucknow Workshop, Indian Railways on Dec 22 from its new Forged Wheel Plant (FWP) Lalganj, Raebareli, UP.
RINL has set up the plant at a cost of Rs 1,700 cr with a production capacity of 1 lakh pieces of forged wheels/yr
